remarks: Value of the monoid operation of the free monoid construction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Sep-2015.)
statement:
frmdbas.m $e |- M = ( freeMnd ` I ) $.
frmdbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
frmdplusg.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) $.
frmdadd $p |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( X ++ Y ) ) $.
